column1: Little Goat Diner////I have heard many great reviews about this diner so I was inclined to try it. I was recommended the biscuit and gravy which I thought was very filling
column2: hearty and tasteful. My friend got the waffles and chicken. She let me try some of it. Midway through the meal
column4: and it was egg shells. We assumed that egg shells were not part of the dish. I would have thought that this culinary mistake would be unheard of from a top chef winner's restaurant. Just carelessness and lack of attention to detail... Â disappointed...
